% TRIM-TSV(1)
% Clark Grubb
% September 25, 2013


# NAME

trim-tsv - trim whitespace from fields in a tab delimited file

# SYNOPSIS

trim-tsv [TSV_FILE]

# DESCRIPTION

Trim whitespace from fields in a tab delimited file.  If no path is specified on the command line, the tool reads from standard input.

# OPTIONS

none

# SEE ALSO

`tawk` (1)
